casebody.data:
Vera Davidson, Administratrix of Estate of Scott Davidson, Jr., Deceased, Appellant, v. A. A. Sprague and Britton I. Budd, Appellees.Gen. No. 40,620.

(Abstract of Decision.)

Heard in third division, first district, at February term, 1939;original opinion filed December 13, 1939;rehearing opinion filed April 10, 1940.Walter F. Boye and Henry J. Hughes, for appellant, Gardner, Foote, Morrow & Merrick, for appellees;Walter Opinion by Justice Hebel.

“Not to be published in full.”
